mapper.insert: insert into payment_detail (paydetailcode, deductcode, paycode, deductpay, taxstatus, bonusstatus, usestatus) values (#{paydetailcode},#{deductcode},#{paycode},#{deductpay} ,#{taxstatus},#{bonusstatus},#{usestatus})
mapper.select: select paydetailcode, deductcode, paycode, deductpay, taxstatus, bonusstatus, usestatus from payment_detail
select paydetailcode, deductcode, paycode, deductpay, taxstatus, bonusstatus, usestatus from payment_detail where paydetailcode = #{paydetailcode}
